localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit

blogPost.excerpt: Ever used Netflix party or Prime party with friends. Well here is an application to watch locally downloaded videos.
blogPost.body: Ever used Netflix party or Prime party with friends. Well here is an application to watch locally downloaded videos.
blogPost.title: Video Party - Watch videos together
blogPost.author: Varun Gujarathi

previous.title:
It's incredible that we have access to things like this on Twitter. 

The guts of the system are completely foreign to 99.9% of investors, myself included. 

If you want to understand what happened last week, this is a must-read. https://t.co/ZGpNXjWxLI

next.excerpt: Crucial Human Theme is a VSCode IDE dark theme dressed in royal purple and designed to keep you focused. Click "Get It" to install it from the Visual Studio Marketplace or simply search for "Crucial Human" from inside VSCode -> Extensions.
